mapper.select: select a.*, c.name as patient_name,c.sex as patient_sex,c.idcard as patient_idcard,c.age as patient_age from his_medical as a left join his_medical_record as b on a.record_id = b.id left join his_patient_info as c on b.patient_id = c.id where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
